scriptsComments.start: Runs the server with the schedulers, Client must be built first. This is also the main script that will be used in production
scriptsComments.dev:server: Runs the server with nodemon without the scheduler, this is mainly for development purposes as we don't want the scheduler to always run in development. The Client must be built first
scriptsComments.dev:frontend: Runs the client in development mode. This doesn't run the server, it only runs the client
scriptsComments.dev:frontend:build: Builds the client in development mode. This doesn't run the server, it only builds the client
scriptsComments.dev: Runs the client and server concurrently. This is mainly for development purposes
scriptsComments.heroku-postbuild: This script is used by Heroku to build the client after the server has been built
